attr.name: port
attr.comment: Server port (for Unix derivatives, use a value greater than 1024)

attr.name: ssl
attr.comment: Use secure sockets layer for connection to the server

attr.name: requireAuthentication
attr.comment: Require authentication for connection to the server

attr.name: proxyIPAddress
attr.comment: The IP address of the proxy server (or blank if no proxy server)

attr.name: proxyPort
attr.comment: The port of the proxy server (or blank if no proxy server)

attr.name: proxyUsername
attr.comment: The username for proxy authentication (or blank if proxy authentication is not used)

attr.name: proxyPassword
attr.comment: The password for proxy authentication (or blank if proxy authentication is not used)

attr.name: usersClassName
attr.comment: The Java class for user authentication. Do not change this unless you know what you're doing.

attr.name: name
attr.comment: This field should be unique, at least within its pipeline.

attr.name: id
attr.comment: This field is required only when the stage is to be referenced by another stage. If present, it must be unique.

attr.name: root
attr.comment: Storage directory for use by the stage for data (must be unique)

attr.name: type
attr.comment: Structure of the storage tree

attr.name: timeDepth
attr.comment: Length of time in days before studies are automatically purged (0 = forever)

attr.name: acceptDuplicateUIDs
attr.comment: Yes: keep all objects; no: overwrite objects with the same SOPInstanceUID

attr.name: acceptFileObjects
attr.comment: Accept received FileObjects

attr.name: returnStoredFile
attr.comment: Yes: return the stored object; no: return the original object

attr.name: setWorldReadable
attr.comment: Set the read permission on stored files

attr.name: setWorldWritable
attr.comment: Set the write permission on stored files

attr.name: fsNameTag
attr.comment: DICOM tag to use to obtain the File System name for storage

attr.name: autoCreateUser
attr.comment: Automatically create user account for the fsName

attr.comment: Port to use for a server to provide web access to stored objects

attr.comment: Require secure sockets layer for connection to the server

attr.comment: Maximum width of created JPEG image

attr.name: q
